articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: FIA President Ben Sulayem advises Andretti to "buy another F1 team" - Autosport
articles.description: FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem has changed his stance on admitting Andretti Cadillac to Formula 1, advising Andretti to "go and buy another team".
articles.content:
Andretti was refused a 2026 entry by F1 after the FIA had admitted its application on a technical basis.
Ben Sulayem was a proponent of expanding F1's grid of 10 teams, opening up a tender process t… [+3315 chars]
